> A culinary-focused brand centered around Vic Vegas, drawing inspiration from Real Vegas Magazine and All Pro Media Group. The website should showcase Vic Vegas prominently with photography and maintain a magazine-style editorial approach to culinary content.

---

## Pages

### Home
https://vic-vegas.zappy5.app
Step into the culinary world of Vic Vegas, where iconic Vegas flair meets magazine-style food storytelling. Explore recipes, editorial features, and courses.

### About Vic
https://vic-vegas.zappy5.app/about
Discover the story of Vic Vegas, inspired by the legendary neon cowboy and Real Vegas Magazine. Learn how culinary passion meets editorial excellence.

### Editorial
https://vic-vegas.zappy5.app/editorial
Dive into expertly crafted culinary editorial content from Vic Vegas. Get inspired by food photography, recipes, and insider Vegas dining perspectives.

### Contact
https://vic-vegas.zappy5.app/contact
Ready to collaborate or enroll in culinary arts online courses? Reach out to Vic Vegas for partnerships, inquiries, and exclusive culinary opportunities.

# Business Context (for LLM understanding)

## About Vic Vegas
A culinary-focused brand centered around Vic Vegas, drawing inspiration from Real Vegas Magazine and All Pro Media Group. The website should showcase Vic Vegas prominently with photography and maintain a magazine-style editorial approach to culinary content.

## Target Audience
- Home Cooking Enthusiasts
- Culinary Professionals
- Food Bloggers and Influencers
- Health & Wellness Cooks
- Culinary Tourists

## Industry
culinary/food
